introduction.description: Hello! I'm Naël Maanli, currently in my first year of PeiP D (Parcours des écoles d'ingénieurs Polytech) at I.U.T. of Nantes to earn a degree in computer engineering.

projects.title: Personal Projects
projects.description: Click on the project to access its main page.

asam.description: is software designed to simplify the use of numeric equipment for primary school teachers and students who may not be comfortable with technology.

nantibus.description: is a mobile application that uses available open data from the Nantes transport network to create an ergonomic and interactive application with a map, list of stops, lists of different lines, and other features that simplify the use and understanding of transport-related applications in the metropolis. It's a collaborative project!!

bibliom.description: is simplified software for managing a BCD or small to large library.
